CommandUIHandler.CommandAction: javascript: function getItemIds() { var itemIds = ''; var items = SP.ListOperation.Selection.getSelectedItems(); var item; for (var i in items) { item = items[i]; if(itemIds != '') { itemIds = itemIds + ','; } itemIds = itemIds + item.id; } return itemIds; } function invokeViewAnalyticsReport() { window.location = '{SiteUrl}' + '/_layouts/15/reporting.aspx' + '?Category=Analytics&List=' + encodeURIComponent(ctx.listName) + '&ID=' + getItemIds(); } invokeViewAnalyticsReport();
CommandUIHandler.EnabledScript: javascript: function enableViewAnalyticsReport() { var items = SP.ListOperation.Selection.getSelectedItems(); return (items.length > 0); } enableViewAnalyticsReport();

CommandUIHandler.CommandAction: javascript: function invokeViewTopReport() { STSNavigate('{SiteUrl}' + '/_layouts/15/topreport.aspx' + '?List=' + encodeURIComponent(ctx.listName)); } invokeViewTopReport();
CommandUIHandler.EnabledScript: javascript: function enableViewTopReport() { return true; } enableViewTopReport();
